node.description: Activities: Ultimate Frisbee Team (Treasurer), Student Newspaper (Editor), Student Government, Ski Team##Awards/Honors: Sophomore, Junior Computer Science Awards (for distinction in Computer Science)##Relevant Courses: U.S. Political Speech, Conducting Political Research, Data Structures, Digital Sound Processing, Cybersecurity, Software Engineering, Game Design, Operating Systems
I spent my time in Edinburgh studying Computer Science and Public Policy.##I co-hosted a radio show and played Ultimate Frisbee.
